subject: Hockey, Ice
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Halls of Fame
organizations: United States Hockey Hall of Fame
lead_paragraph: All five of the 2011 inductees into the United States Hockey Hall of Fame played a central role in the Americans’ 1996 World Cup of Hockey championship.
snippet: All five of the 2011 inductees into the United States Hockey Hall of Fame played a central role in the Americans’ 1996 World Cup of Hockey championship.
